did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The Richard Faraday Collection consists of photocopies of a formula book for making lead shot at the Shot Tower in Wythe County, Virginia. The collection also includes genealogical notes on Faraday's family.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Richard Faraday Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Richard Faraday Collection, Ms1984-177, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Richard Faraday Collection was acquired by Special Collections prior to 1984.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Richard Faraday Collection was completed in 1984. Additional description was completed in April 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Richard Faraday Collection consists of photocopies of a formula book for making lead shot at the Shot Tower in Wythe County, Virginia. The collection also includes genealogical notes on Faraday's family.
